plays.text: Goal scored by JEFF O'NEILL assisted by Sami Kapanen
Goal scored by Glen Wesley assisted by Erik Cole and David Tanabe
Penalty to Marek Malik 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Robert Kron
Penalty to Grant Marshall 2 minutes for Tripping Chris Dingman
Goal scored by Ray Whitney assisted by Lyle Odelein and Espen Knutsen
Penalty to Espen Knutsen 2 minutes for High Sticking Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Mike Sillinger 2 minutes for Tripping Jeff Daniels
Goal scored by ROD BRIND'AMOUR assisted by Martin Gelinas and Shane Willis
Goal scored by Jeff Daniels assisted by Erik Cole and Bates Battaglia
Penalty to Grant Marshall 2 minutes for Slashing Sandis Ozolinsh
Penalty to Erik Cole 2 minutes for Hooking Ray Whitney
Goal scored by Robert Kron assisted by Kevin Dineen and Deron Quint
Penalty to David Tanabe 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Blake Sloan
Penalty to Erik Cole 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Marc Denis
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Geoff Sanderson
Penalty to Serge Aubin 2 minutes for Elbowing Shane Willis
Goal scored by Marek Malik unassisted
